name: 42 Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a predictive analytics platform designed to provide businesses with clear insights on how to expand their operations. The company's platform considers multiple retail-specific metrics to leverage all business retail data from a top-level overview of the business to visual item reporting, drill-down analysis, and ad-hoc reporting, enabling retail businesses to reduce the time spent in making key performance indicators.
one_liner: Developer of a predictive analytics platform designed to provide businesses with clear insights on how to expand their operations. The company's platform considers multiple retail-specific metrics to leverage all business retail data from a top-level overview of the business to visual item reporting, drill-down analysis, and ad-hoc reporting, enabling retail businesses to reduce the time spent in making key performance indicators.
